# Interface ContentStreamIterator

Streaming interface for rich content from advanced language model nodes.

Provides asynchronous streaming for complex content with text and tool calls.

interface ContentStreamIterator {  
next: () => Promise<[ContentStreamIterationResult](./common_stream_content.ContentStreamIterationResult)>;  
toTextResponse: (  
props: TextStreamIterationToTextResponseInterface,  
) => [TransformationStreamTextToText](/classes/common_stream_transformation_implementations.TransformationStreamTextToText);  
toTTSOutputResponse: (  
props: {  
filter?: (text: string) => boolean;  
transform: (  
text: string,  
) => [TTSOutputInterface](./common_data_types_common.TTSOutputInterface) | Promise<[TTSOutputInterface](./common_data_types_common.TTSOutputInterface)>;  
},  
) => [TransformationStreamTextToTTS](/classes/common_stream_transformation_implementations.TransformationStreamTextToTTS);  
}

##### Index

### Properties

next toTextResponse toTTSOutputResponse

## Properties

### next

next: () => Promise<[ContentStreamIterationResult](./common_stream_content.ContentStreamIterationResult)>

Asynchronously reads the next content chunk from the stream.

    * #### Returns Promise<[ContentStreamIterationResult](./common_stream_content.ContentStreamIterationResult)>

Converts the stream to a TTS output response format.

#### Type declaration

props: {  
filter?: (text: string) => boolean;  
transform: (  
text: string,  
) => [TTSOutputInterface](./common_data_types_common.TTSOutputInterface) | Promise<[TTSOutputInterface](./common_data_types_common.TTSOutputInterface)>;

    * #### Parameters

filter?: (text: string) => boolean;  
transform: (  
text: string,  
) => [TTSOutputInterface](./common_data_types_common.TTSOutputInterface) | Promise<[TTSOutputInterface](./common_data_types_common.TTSOutputInterface)>;  
}

Configuration for TTS output response conversion

        * ##### `Optional`filter?: (text: string) => boolean

Optional predicate function to filter text before processing. Returns true to include the text, false to exclude it

        * ##### transform: (text: string) => [TTSOutputInterface](./common_data_types_common.TTSOutputInterface) | Promise<[TTSOutputInterface](./common_data_types_common.TTSOutputInterface)>

Function that converts text to TTS output. Takes a string input and returns either a Promise resolving to TTSOutputInterface or TTSOutputInterface directly

#### Returns [TransformationStreamTextToTTS](/classes/common_stream_transformation_implementations.TransformationStreamTextToTTS)

TransformationStreamTextToTTS instance for audio processing
